sent.orig: A lorry driver narrowly escaped with his life after the lorry flipped over the embankment.
sent.trans: 卡车冲出筑堤，司机险些丧命。

sent.orig: 'I am pretty well, I thank you,' answered Mr. Lorry, with meekness; 'how are you?'
sent.trans: “很好，谢谢，”罗瑞先生回答，态度温驯，“你好么？”

sent.orig: It is Jarvis Lorry who has replied to all the previous questions.
sent.trans: 上面的问题都是由贾维斯 - 罗瑞一一回答的。

sent.orig: 'This is something new to me, Mr. Lorry.
sent.trans: “这对我倒挺新鲜的，罗瑞先生。

sent.orig: Their minivan was in collision with an Army lorry.
sent.trans: 他们的小货车兴军用卡车相撞。
